text: [Music]
we're in the
financial technology industry
we build software for
valuation and risk measurement of
financial derivatives
so our software solutions
allow our customers to make
informed decisions about their trade
portfolios the business problem we were
looking to solve was the company
identified a
an opportunity to solve a problem in
japan for regional banks there is a new
reporting requirement
that they report on something called cva
or credit valuation adjustment we wanted
to build a solution that would meet that
need for these clients so we ended up
building a very scalable observable
system based on aws using their
serverless technology the challenge was
it was a very short
time period from when we discovered this
opportunity and to the point where we
actually were able to meet this new
software requirement for them cba is a
very computationally expensive operation
it requires a lot of work and even for a
modest portfolio size of just a few
thousand trades
it can take many many hours
of compute time um and so one of the
things we had to solve was being able to
take a complex portfolio of many
thousands of trades
value them in a short period of time
so we were able to do that in under five
minutes for a non-trivial portfolio so
we actually have a relatively small
development team compared to the
overall
company size
so we have a very lean mentality of our
development team and we are able to
design
build
implement and deploy
a solution in a very short period of
time
and this was a huge benefit to a company
of our size because
if we didn't have to manage all of the
different services we didn't have to buy
hardware we didn't have to engage data
centers to
build out a very significant scalable
solution we can now
focus the team
on building out the application logic
and not worry about infrastructure
challenges not worry about on-prem
challenges
and can instead focus on the
the the the really important aspects of
of the system such as the scalability
the observability and the smooth
operation of the system
